docs.snippet: Diplomatic relations between Bolivia and Paraguay will be formally resumed tomorrow when their new Ministers simultaneously present their credentials here and at Asuncion in the presence of the diplomatic representatives of the six American nations...
docs.lead_paragraph: Diplomatic relations between Bolivia and Paraguay will be formally resumed tomorrow when their new Ministers simultaneously present their credentials here and at Asuncion in the presence of the diplomatic representatives of the six American nations that acted as mediators at the Chaco peace conference.
docs.abstract: Bolivia invites all Amer nations to send special embassies to Aguirre Cerda's inauguration

docs.snippet: Another reminder of the approach of Christmas came with the announcement yesterday by Postmaster Albert Goldman of the foreign Christmas mail closings for the coming week. With Christmas drawing near, the Postmaster again urged early mailing.
docs.lead_paragraph: Another reminder of the approach of Christmas came with the announcement yesterday by Postmaster Albert Goldman of the foreign Christmas mail closings for the coming week. With Christmas drawing near, the Postmaster again urged early mailing.

headline.main: Christmas Mail Dates For Distant Points Given

docs.snippet: Relations between the United States and Colombia, which have been improving noticeably for a considerable time, were strengthened today through arrangements that were announced for this country to send a military aviation mission and a naval mission...
docs.lead_paragraph: Relations between the United States and Colombia, which have been improving noticeably for a considerable time, were strengthened today through arrangements that were announced for this country to send a military aviation mission and a naval mission to the South American republic.

AND COLOMBIA ATTEST GOOD-WILL; United Front at Lima Further Assured by Decision of Ecuador to Attend FELICITATIONS EXCHANGED Aviation and Naval Missions to Be Sent to Bogota-Peru Willing to Negotiate Legations Raised Message of Felicitation Missions Arranged Lima Prospects Improved Message Appreciated Delegates Not Yet Known

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: The Maritime Commission stated today that it had investigated reports of a fire in a hold of the United States liner.Uruguay while in port at Portof-Spain, Trinidad, and had found that no such fire had occurred.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Maritime Commission stated today that it had investigated reports of a fire in a hold of the United States liner.Uruguay while in port at Portof-Spain, Trinidad, and had found that no such fire had occurred.

headline.main: FIRE ABOARD SHIP DENIED; No Blaze on Liner Uruguay, the Maritime Commission States

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: A study of South American educational institutions will be made by the Rev. John F. O'Hara, president of the University of Notre Dame, who is a member of the American delegation to the inter-American congress opening in Lima, Peru, Dec. 9.
docs.lead_paragraph: A study of South American educational institutions will be made by the Rev. John F. O'Hara, president of the University of Notre Dame, who is a member of the American delegation to the inter-American congress opening in Lima, Peru, Dec. 9.

docs.snippet: The first Latin-American insurance congress was inaugurated this morning at the University of Chile. It is sponsored by the Chilean Reinsurance Bureau.
docs.lead_paragraph: The first Latin-American insurance congress was inaugurated this morning at the University of Chile. It is sponsored by the Chilean Reinsurance Bureau.
